issues.message: Member variable 'RemoteStorageUpdatePublishedFileRequest_t::m_eVisibility' is not initialized in the constructor.
Rename class "_Acquire_ReturnProxy" to match the regular expression ^[A-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9]+$.
Member variable 'RemoteStorageUpdatePublishedFileRequest_t::m_eVisibility' is not initialized in the constructor.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "void *" 3 times.
Member variable 'CCallbackBase::m_iCallback' is not initialized in the constructor.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal '-Isteamworks_sdk_%s/' 4 times.
%u in format string (no. 4) requires 'unsigned int' but the argument type is 'signed int'.

Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "case 0x%08x: win_msg->m_cubParam = %s; win_msg->m_pubParam = HeapAlloc(GetProcessHeap(), 0, win_msg->m_cubParam); %s((void*)lin_msg.m_pubParam, (void*)win_msg->m_pubParam); break;\n" 3 times.
%u in format string (no. 3) requires 'unsigned int' but the argument type is 'signed int'.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "#ifdef __i386__\n" 6 times.
